seriesJson.title: Search for mental health
seriesJson.description: A series of talks about the latest advances in psychiatry by staff members of Forest Hospital near Chicago.

node.title: Adolescent psychiatry
node.description: This program features an interview with Dr. Heuitt Ryan about adolescent psychiatry.

node.title: Community psychiatry: What is done?
node.description: This program features an interview with Dr. Dan Lieberman about community psychiatry.

node.title: Student problems
node.description: This program features an interview with Dr. Alfred Heaste about student problems.

node.title: Sexual offenders
node.description: This program features an interview with Dr. James Mathis about sexual offenders.

node.title: Suicide
node.description: This program features an interview with Dr. George Murphy about suicide.

node.title: The importance of the family
node.description: This program features an interview with Imogene Young about the importance of the family.

node.title: The importance of human behavior
node.description: This program features an interview with Dr. Ian Algers about the importance of human behavior.

node.title: How does psychiatry help?
node.description: This program features an interview with Dr. Jordan Scher asking how does psychiatry help?

node.title: Treatment of the young
node.description: This program features an interview with Dr. Sherman Feinstein on treatment of the young.

node.title: Working with the adolescent
node.description: This program features an interview with Dr. Delbert Kole about adolescent mental health.

node.title: Working with disturbed children
node.description: This program features an interview with Gertrude R. Wilson about working with mentally ill children.

node.title: Narcotics addiction
node.description: This program features an interview with Dr. Alexander Weech about narcotics addiction.

node.title: Old age psychiatry
node.description: This program features an interview with Dr. Maurice E. Linden about geriatric psychiatry.

node.title: Family help
node.description: This program features an interview with Dr. David Rubinstein about family treatment.

node.title: Alcoholism
node.description: This program features an interview with Dr. Max Hayman about alcoholism.
